/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is flanked by towering buildings and skyscrapers, showcasing the architectural prowess of the city. The sky overhead is a blanket of overcast clouds, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly gray and blue, reflecting the urban landscape and the weather conditions.
